PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1992-08271992-04-300JUS,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisGranting of leave to three Judges to absent themselves from their judicial duties for a period of six months (Jan. 1 - June 30, 1992) so that they can participate in the NATIONAL JUDICIAL STUDY LEAVE FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM. 1. Mr. Justice GUY LEBRUN (Superior Court of Quebec) 2. Mr. Justice DAVID G. RICHE (Supreme Court of Newfoundland) 3. Mr. Justice MELVIN L. ROTHMAN (Court of Appeal of Quebec)
Attachments
